text: The Service was really bad it was very delicious.
translation: Der Service war wirklich schlecht, er war sehr lecker.

text: The atmosphere in the restaurant was cozy, but the food arrived cold.
translation: Die Atmosphäre im Restaurant war gemütlich, aber das Essen kam kalt an.

text: Bad service and overpriced - never again!
translation: Schlechter Service und überteuert - nie wieder!

text: Great ambience and delicious food, I can only recommend it.
